title: The Gay Divorcee cinema slide
creator_credit: Mark Sandrich and RKO Radio Pictures
credit_line: ACMI has endeavoured to contact the owners of these objects since their deposit in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful. We would welcome any information to identify the owners.
brief_description: Two glass sheets: one glass only and the other with slide imagery which has a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye. TEXT on the slide reads: The original would have read in it’s entirety: You are now listening to the Theme Songs of The Gay Divorcee Starring: Fred Astaire Ginger Rogers an R.K.O Radio Picture
